Go Back Review Name: Terrific Review Description: Absolute silent in function once it attains the set temperature, meaning no disturbing noise whatsoever while in deep sleep. 4 way cooling is great and ensures good circulation within the room. Inverter technology ensures constant temperature in the room and keeps us away from disturbing on and off noise of compressor. These are certain features which increases the price of this product, but if you are exactly looking for this feature then worth spending money.
